{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Single-board Computer w/Arduino Interface |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.udoo.org/udoo-dual-and-quad/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = UDOO |model = Quad |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = QR4WF5370M08 |icid = 10663A-WF5370M08 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6Q;MCIMX6Q5EYM10AC; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = <!-- 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |cpu2chip1 = Atmel;SAM3X8E; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu2_type_rev = 84<!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = <!-- CPU1 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Micrel;KSZ9031RN; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:C0:08 |oui = 7C:DD:90
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.08;; |stockos = Linux;3.0.35;Ubuntu 12.04;,
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 6-15 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1),, CN6 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, LVDS, CSI, GPIO, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), Micro SD Card slot, |addchip = AC’97 Audio Codec;VIA;VT1613;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2514B;;1;,,, Single-Chip USB to UART Bridge;Silicon Labs;CP2104;;1;,,, 500mA Low Dropout Regulator;Richtek;RT9186A;;1;,,, 4A, 21V 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8287A;;4;,,, High-Speed USB 2.0 DPDT Switch;AlphaΩAOZ6184;;1;,,, DDR Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9040;;1;,,, 4-Pin Microprocessor Power Supply Supervisor;On Semiconductor;CAT811;;1;,,, 8-bit Flash Microcontroller;Microchip;PIC10F200;;1;,,, Quadruple FET Bus Switch;Texas Instruments;CBT3125PW;;1;,,, Dual 2A, 1.2V Rate Controlled Load Switch, Vishay Siliconix;SiP32416;;1;,,, 2A, 1.2V Rate Controlled Load Switch, Vishay Siliconix;SiP32411;;1;,,, Processor Supervisory Circuit;Diodes Inc;APX823;;1;,,, D-Type CMOS Flip-Flop;ON Semi;NC7SZ74K8X;;1;,,, Single Buffer Driver w/Open-Drain Output;TI;SN74LVC1G07;;1;,,, ESD Protection Diode for HDMI;NXP;IP4283CZ10;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = ubuntu |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SECO |manuf_model = CS975 |manuf_rev = REV D |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Arch Linux (Arm), Armbian, Debian, Android 4.4, Android 6.0,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/09/2012 |estreldate = 09/2013 |estprice = 169 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = ECHIP GWF-3M08 |rad1modif = USB |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT5370; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = PCB on-board |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' i.MX6Q Quad-core Cortex-A9 *GPU: ''Vivante GC 2000 + Vivante GC 320 + Vivante GC 355'' *MCU: ''Atmel'' SAM3X8E Cortex-M3 *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Onboard Storage: TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC Card Slot, SATA
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.udoo.org/docs/Getting_Started/Very_First_Start.html ''UDOO Dual/Quad Documentation'' on '''UDOO.org''' Docs] *[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/udoo/udoo-android-linux-arduino-in-a-tiny-single-board ''UDOO: Android Linux Arduino'' on '''kickstarter''' ] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2013/04/12/udoo-single-board-computer-features-freescale-i-mx6-dualquad-and-atmel-sam3-mcu/ ''UDOO Single Board Computer'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
